devdoc.details: This smart contract is meant to be inherited by token contracts so they can use the following:         - `onlyAllowedOperator` modifier for `transferFrom` and `safeTransferFrom` methods.         - `onlyAllowedOperatorApproval` modifier for `approve` and `setApprovalForAll` methods.
devdoc.title: OperatorFilterer

userdoc.notice: Abstract contract whose constructor automatically registers and optionally subscribes to or copies another         registrant's entries in the OperatorFilterRegistry.
